title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: WOW this is nuts and almost looks fakeÂ     Nice catchhttps://twitter.com/DudespostingWs/status/1580571253315842048

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I saw this online, what an absolute hero with some very quick thinking.I hope the person he saved gets the help & therapy they need to help them so nothing like this happens for them in the future.

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Now that's insane. I thought it was going to be the video where the guy swings from the rope and kicks the guy in the window.It's incredible the firefighter was able to hold onto the guy falling that fast.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: The fireman was very brave to save his life and luckily they are trained in suicide prevention for such a crisis.Whatever has transpired in this man's life was not worth living for and the aftermath will have him on a suicide watch along with a thorough psych evaluation for many years to come.

comments.author: Herperer
comments.body: The firefighter has very good reaction time and strength
